name: Strike Gunner S.T.G
overview:
Strike Gunner S.T.G is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up video game originally released on the arcades in 1991 by Tecmo, and then later ported for the SNES.

The player takes control of a high-tech jet, the "Strike Gunner" of the title, and faces wave after wave of enemies, ranging from helicopters, jets, tanks and airships, among others. On the first screen you select your secondary item like sheilds, homing missiles. etc.
